Àtụ:Infobox settlement
Amorha Khas bụ gram panchayat na Basti district na steeti India nke Uttar Pradesh
Na mgba nnwere onwe nke 1857, ndị ọchịchị Britain kwụgburu ihe dị ka ndị nwụrụ n'ihi okwukwe 250 nke steeti Amorha site na osisi peepal dị na Chhawani.
Ndị Bhars & Kshatriyas chụpụrụ ndị Bhars na-achị Amorha ma guzobe ala a maara dị ka Amorha Raj.
Raja Zalim Singh bụ Eze nke Amorha
Ọ bụ onye Suryavanshi Rajput na Suryavansi Rajputs nke Basti na Ayodhya bụ ụmụ ya
Raja Zalim Singh tinyere Nawab nke Oudh lụsoro ndị na-akwado ọchịchị Britain ọgụ maka ọgụ nnwere onwe India
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 1857, ndị Britain na-akwado ọchịchị ha ghọtara na o siri ike iguzobe ọchịchị ha na Amorha n'ihi mmegide siri ike nke Raja
Nke a manyere onye ọrụ Britain, Col
Robert Craft, ịpụ na mpaghara ahụ na 2nd Mar 1858
Eze nwanyị ikpeazụ nke Amorha, na nwunye Raja Zalim Singh, Rani Talash Kanwar, buuru ngwá agha megide ndị Britain ma gbuo ya n'agha ọbara ọbara.
Raja Zalim Singh bụ onye agha nnwere onwe nke India
Ọ chụpụrụ mwakpo niile nke ndị Britain na mpaghara ya
O ji obi ike chebe ókèala ya megide ndị Britain ruo ogologo oge ruo otu ụbọchị mgbe ndị agha Britain wepụrụ ya ma gbaa ya gburugburu
O jisiri ike gbapụ site na ọwa nzuzo wee gaa n'ihu na-alụ ọgụ megide ndị Britain.
